
## Class : serosa of rectum

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0003334
 * *Label* = serosa of rectum
 * *Definition* = A serous membrane that is part of a rectum [Automatically generated definition].

 * rectum serosa
 * rectum serous membrane
